overview:
Dominic Li brings more than a dozen years of experience in the telecommunications and technology fields to TruePosition. Most recently, Mr. Li was responsible for managing the portfolio development and marketing functions at Sprint Enterprise Mobility, a mobility-focused consulting and systems integration subsidiary of Sprint. Prior to joining Sprint, Mr. Li was Vice President with British Telecom, managing portfolio development, marketing, and channel development functions in the US. Additionally, Mr. Li has held key management and executive positions in the areas of global marketing and strategy with organizations such as VeriSign, Oracle, and Apple.

Dominic Li holds an MBA in Management Information Systems and a BS in Business Administration from the University of Minnesota, and has completed advanced studies in marketing at the University of Michigan MBA Program.

relationships.title: VIce President of Marketing and Portfolio Management
